room_title: Escape room "The Hidden Cabin" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
room_address: 282 Main Street Extension, Historic Sanseer Mill, Middletown, CT 06457
room_description: In a small Baroque church in Rome, a magnificent Caravaggio altarpiece has disappeared without a trace. In a secret vault in Vienna, the disappearance of the great treasure, Buste de Femme 1938 by Pablo Picasso, has been discovered. At the Gallery of Modern Art in London, the museum's newest acquisition is stolen just hours after it was purchased. Can you out-maneuver a master thief?
